dt-api.name: table().footer.structure()
dt-api.summary: Get a JavaScript representation of the table footer structure

type.description: Get the structure of the table footer
type.parameter: Select which columns to get the footer cells for. By default all columns in the table (regardless of visibility) will be retrieved.
type.returns: An array of arrays containing objects and null values that describe the footer structure.

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to get a JavaScript native representation of the HTML structure of the table's footer. It allows for complex footer (i.e. cells with `colspan` and `rowspan` attributes) and multi-row footer.
Please see the documentation for `-api table().header.structure()` for a full description of the data structure this method returns. The is exactly the same, just for the table's footer.
